00023 #include <Ogre.h>

00025 #if OGRE_PLATFORM == OGRE_PLATFORM_WIN32
00026 #       include "al.h"
00027 #       include "alc.h"
00028 #       include "efx.h"
00029 #       include "efx-util.h"
00030 #       include "efx-creative.h"
00031 #       include "xram.h"
00032 #       if OGRE_COMPILER == OGRE_COMPILER_MSVC
00033 #               ifdef OGGSOUND_EXPORT
00034 #                       define _OGGSOUND_EXPORT __declspec(dllexport)
00035 #               else
00036 #                       define _OGGSOUND_EXPORT __declspec(dllimport)
00037 #               endif
00038 #       else
00039 #               define _OGGSOUND_EXPORT
00040 #       endif
00041 #elif OGRE_COMPILER == OGRE_COMPILER_GNUC
00042 #       include <AL/al.h>
00043 #       include <AL/alc.h>
00044 #       if defined(OGGSOUND_EXPORT) && OGRE_COMP_VER >= 400
00045 #               define _OGGSOUND_EXPORT __attribute__ ((visibility("default")))
00046 #       else
00047 #               define _OGGSOUND_EXPORT
00048 #       endif
00049 #else // Other Compilers
00050 #       include <OpenAL/al.h>
00051 #       include <OpenAL/alc.h>
00052 #       include "xram.h"
00053 #       define _OGGSOUND_EXPORT
00054 #endif
